SEARCH
Package org.domain.classes

Class ProductList

java.lang.Object
org.domain.classes.ProductList
public class ProductList extends Object
Represents a list of products with a specific category. Ensures that products added to the list match the category of the list. Provides methods to add products, apply discounts, and print the list of products. Keeps track of the last modification date.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Shmyhelskyy Yaskevych (sergio.shmyhelskyy@estudiantat.upc.edu)

    • ProductList

      public ProductList(String name, String category)
      Constructs a new ProductList with the specified name and category.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product list
      category - the category of the products in the list

  • Method Details

    • loadProduct

      public void loadProduct(Product product)
      Loads a product into the list. This method is used to load products from the database.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add to the ProductList

    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct(Product product)
      Adds a product to the list if it matches the category of the list. Updates the last modification date if the product is added.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add
      Returns:
      true if the product was added, false otherwise

    • removeProduct

      public boolean removeProduct(String productName)
      Removes a product from the list. Updates the last modification date if the product is removed.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product to remove
      Returns:
      true if the product was removed, false otherwise

    • applyDiscount

      public void applyDiscount(double discount)
      Applies a discount to all products in the list. Updates the last modification date.
      Parameters:
      discount - the discount percentage to apply

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the product list is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the product list is empty, false otherwise

    • getLastModified

      public LocalDateTime getLastModified()
      Gets the last modification date of the product list.
      Returns:
      the last modification date

      public void setLastModified(LocalDateTime lastModified)

      Parameters:

    • getProduct

      public Product getProduct(String productName)
      Gets a product from the product list by name.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the product with the specified name, or null if the product is not found

    • getTotalQuantity

      public int getTotalQuantity()
      Gets the total quantity of products in the list. The quantity is the sum of all the amounts of the products in the ProductList.
      Returns:
      the total quantity of products in the list
